description: Design and manage eLearning courses on Surna using your choice of Agentic AI system. Create and organise lessons, add interactive blocks and assessments, and handle assets with ease. Export or import courses and work across language versions to streamline authoring at scale.

SURNA_API_KEY.description: Get this from https://surna.io → Account Settings → API Keys

SURNA_MCP_MODE.description: efficient: return only search_tools on list_tools for minimal context; traditional: expose all tools for backward compatibility

tools.name: get_surna_api_docs
tools.description: Retrieve Surna API documentation. Call this first to load the right section before executing actions.

topic.description: Optional: Specific topic or operation you need help with (e.g., "language translation", "getting blocks", "batch operations")

section.description: Which section of docs to retrieve. Use "full" for complete reference, or specific sections for targeted help. Note: "languages" is a separate section for translation operations.

tools.name: execute_surna_action
tools.description: Execute JavaScript against the Surna API (courses, lessons, blocks, assets). Read docs first, then run your script.

script.description: JavaScript code to execute. The "surna" object is available globally. Must return a value.
